ground_truth.thought: 获取关于中国消费金融公司客户满意度的最新文章
ground_truth.name: BingNews.get_latest_articles

args.q: 中国消费金融客户满意度

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BingNews.get_latest_articles', 'description': 'Get the latest articles on a specific topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic to search for'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'the list of articles, each article is a dict with title, summary, and url'}]}, {'name': 'SurveyMonkey.get_survey_results', 'description': 'Get the results of a specific survey.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'survey_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the survey'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'results', 'description': 'the survey results'}]}, {'name': 'RankingSystem.get_company_ranking', 'description': 'Get the ranking of companies in a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the industry to rank companies in'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rankings', 'description': 'the list of company rankings'}]}, {'name': 'CustomerFeedback.get_company_feedback', 'description': 'Get customer feedback for a specific company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the company'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'feedback', 'description': 'the list of customer feedback'}]}, {'name': 'CustomerService.get_service_suggestions', 'description': 'Get service improvement suggestions for a specific company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the company'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'suggestions', 'description': 'the list of service improvement suggestions'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
